0.1.2.en: Added Lightning detector and weather station.

0.1.3.en: Added Insight option to custom capabilities.

0.1.4.en: Added flow trigger for Air Quality changed. Fixed issue with settings not saving. Added logging to confirm server has started / show errors.

0.1.5.en: Updated battery percentage calculation for the soil moisture sensor and added an option to specify if the battery is type rechargeable.
